official_title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel WINDDANCER for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue for a named vessel a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

titles.title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel WINDDANCER for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.
